string.text:
A Soviet 7.62x39mm semi-automatic carbine produced in the early 1950s. Cosmetically worn, but mechanically intact.
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Origin: %c[ui_gray_1]Soviet Union
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_1]Tula Arsenal
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255]Production Year: %c[ui_gray_1]1951
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] None
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Simple Weapons Pack: Replacement modification kit
